definitions.definition: say again something one has already said.
say again (something said or written by someone else).
examples: he repeated the words after me
synonyms: regurgitate "children can repeat large chunks of text"

definitions.definition: say or do the same thing again.

examples: force was not—repeat, not—to be used

definitions.definition: do (something) again, either once or a number of times.
examples: earlier experiments were to be repeated on a far larger scale
synonyms: duplicate More"Steele was invited to repeat his work"recurrent
very many "his repeated complaints about the noise"

definitions.definition: broadcast (a television or radio program) again.
examples: rebroadcast, rerun the episodes were repeated

definitions.definition: undertake (a course or period of instruction) again.
examples: Mark had to repeat first and second grades

definitions.definition: occur again in the same way or form.
examples: I don't intend to let history repeat itself
synonyms: happen again "history is bound to repeat itself"

definitions.definition: illegally vote more than once in an election.
attain a particular success or achievement again, especially by winning a championship for the second consecutive time.
examples: the first team in nineteen years to repeat as NBA champions

definitions.definition: (of a watch or clock) strike (the last hour or quarter) over again when required.
(of food) be tasted intermittently for some time after being swallowed as a result of belching or indigestion.
examples: it sat rather uncomfortably on my stomach and repeated on me for hours

definitions.definition: an action, event, or other thing that occurs or is done again.
examples: the final will be a repeat of last year
synonyms: rehash "a repeat of the previous year's final"

definitions.definition: a repeated broadcast of a television or radio program.
examples: rerun, rebroadcast repeats of the classic sitcom

definitions.definition: occurring, done, or used more than once.
a consignment of goods similar to one already received.
a decorative pattern that is repeated uniformly over a surface.
a passage intended to be repeated.
